attributes.action: traffic light system and speed limits of 20mph speed zone in Lewes Road.
attributes.additional_details: Previous Accidents involing children nearly been killed http://www.eastbourneherald.co.uk/news/local/campaign-for-school-lights-after-accident-1-6020441
attributes.background: I ask that Eastbourne East Sussex on Lewes Road Junction with kings drive is to have a traffic light system and speed limits of 20mph speed zone after children have been hit by fast moving vechiles and it wont be long before a child is killed. i nearly been hit myself by vechiles along this road.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local speed limits and traffic problems are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:
https://new.eastsussex.gov.uk/yourcouncil/consultation/petitions
